content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a monthly rental price of 1,200 euros would be reasonable. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable price. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,200 euros. Thank you.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Great, Juan! I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I'm sure you'll enjoy living in the apartment and making it your own. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns during the lease term.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Hi, I have one question. Can I bring my own furniture and decorations into the apartment?

Hello, Juan. Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 1,200 euros per month. I'm excited to move into the apartment and make it my own. Do you have any rules or restrictions regarding bringing my own furniture and decorations into the apartment?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Hello Juan,

Thank you for your interest in renting the apartment. Regarding your question, I can confirm that you are allowed to bring your own furniture and decorations into the apartment. However, there are a few rules that you should be aware of:

1. You must not damage or remove any fixtures or fittings from the apartment.
2. You must not make any structural changes to the apartment without prior permission from me.
3. You must not use any nails or screws to attach furniture or decorations to the walls or floors.

Other than these rules, you are free to make the apartment your own and personalize it to your liking. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
